title: Bug 115606Invalid html tag for SVG output
description: When generating SVG content in html output, Report Engine currently uses[width="xxx" height="xxxx"] as the html tag, which results in the wrong effectin browser. but when generating ordinary image content, it uses[style="width:xxxx;height:xxxx"] which shows the correct size.Expcected Report Engine also uses the html style tag to ouptut the SVG content.
